#id=1
#text=I went to my hairdresser a few weeks ago for a hair cut .
#id=2
#text=My appointment was at 3:15 , so I arrived at about 3:10 .
#id=3
#text=When I got there , Kayla -LRB- my hairdresser -RRB- was still finishing up with her last appointment .
#id=4
#text=So I sat in the waiting area .
#id=5
#text=The attendant at the desk offered me water or coffee , but I said no thank you .
#id=6
#text=When Kayla was done with her last appointment , she called me in and I sat down in the swivel chair in front of the mirror at her station .
#id=7
#text=She asked what I wanted done with my hair , and I showed her about how short I wanted it to be , a little shorter than usual .
#id=8
#text=She noticed that my hair did seem to have grown a lot since the last time I was in .
#id=9
#text=We went to a back room where there are sinks for washing hair .
#text=I sat down in front of the sink Kayla told me to sit at , then I leaned back to put my head in the sink , and Kayla washed my hair and conditioned it .
#text=Then she put a towel on my hair and we went back to her chair , where she cut my hair .
#text=While she was cutting my hair , we talked about a lot of things .
#text=Kayla has a young son so I asked about him .
#text=I also ended up talking to a woman who was getting her hair cut next to me .
#text=The time flew , and then Kayla used the blow dryer to dry my hair and curled it with a flat iron and put hair spray on it .
#text=I was very happy with my hair cut .
#text=I paid at the front desk and made sure to leave Kayla a tip , and then I went home .
